io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network

Class PlainTextEventEncrypter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.services.network.AbstractEventEncrypter
      • io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network.PlainTextEventEncrypter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventEncrypter

    public class PlainTextEventEncrypter
extends AbstractEventEncrypter
    A utility implementation of the EventEncrypter that does not apply any encryption algorithm.

    The main use of the class should be development to be able to easy see what's being transfered on the wire.

    Version:
    2.0.1.0 2014-10-16 21:50:58
    Author:

    Maven Artifact Id:
